channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Auto More Tag
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Auto More Tag

item.title: CVE-2022-2411|2024-08-03T00:39:07.269Z -- unknown -- auto%20more%20tag
item.description: The Auto More Tag WordPress plugin through 4.0.0 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
